alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 6:49PM CDT until June 03 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Central Hunt County * WHEN...Until 1000 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greenville, Commerce, Farmersville, Wolfe City, Caddo Mills, Celeste, Campbell, Greenville City Lakes, Merit, Josephine, Ladonia, Neylandville, Kellogg, South Sulphur, Kingston, Center Point, Fairlie, Dixon, Floyd and Clinton.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
